name: table_schema_specs_for_c2m2_encoding_of_GTEx_v7_data
title: A complete list of schematic specifications for the resources (tables) that will be used to represent GTEx v7 (meta)data prior to ingest into a CFDE C2M2 database instance.

resources.name: File
resources.description: A digital asset

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this File

fields.name: url
fields.title: A resolvable identifier pointing to the location of this File

fields.name: information_type
fields.title: A CV term ID referencing the type of data contained in this File (target ontology: EDAM)

fields.name: file_format
fields.title: A CV term ID referencing the data format in which this File is encoded (target ontology: EDAM)

fields.name: length
fields.title: The length of this File in bytes

fields.name: filename
fields.title: A suggested local filename for this File

fields.name: md5
fields.title: MD5 checksum for this File

resources.name: BioSample
resources.description: A tissue sample or other physical specimen

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this BioSample

fields.name: subject
fields.title: A foreign key referencing the Subject (source organism(s)) that provided the material for this BioSample

fields.name: sample_type
fields.title: A CV term ID referencing the type of material represented by this BioSample (target ontology: OBI)

fields.name: anatomy
fields.title: A CV term ID locating the origin of this BioSample within the physiology of its Subject (target ontology: UBERON)

fields.name: protocol
fields.title: A foreign key referencing the experimental protocol that generated this BioSample

fields.name: rank
fields.title: An integer specifying the relative sequence ordering associated with this BioSample within a set of associated BioSamples

fields.name: event_ts
fields.title: A datestamp explicitly specifying the date on which this BioSample was collected/generated

resources.name: Subject
resources.description: The source organism(s) from which a BioSample is generated

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this Subject

fields.name: granularity
fields.title: A foreign key referencing the scope of this Subject: single organism; group of named organisms (e.g. host plus pathogen); environmental sample

resources.name: DataEvent
resources.description: An event which generates a data object, e.g.: an assay producing a BioSample; a procedure that produces a File or Files from a BioSample (e.g., sequencing); an observation producing a phenotypic datum (e.g. a BMI measurement); a procedure generating new data from the processing of existing Files (e.g., sequence assembly)

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this DataEvent

fields.name: method
fields.title: A CV term ID referencing the method used to generate the data produced by this DataEvent (target ontology: OBI)

fields.name: platform
fields.title: A CV term ID referencing the particular technologies with which the method in this DataEvent is executed (target ontology: OBI)

fields.name: protocol
fields.title: A foreign key referencing the experimental protocol (or protocol portion) associated with this DataEvent

fields.name: rank
fields.title: An integer specifying the relative sequence ordering associated with this BioSample within the set of associated BioSamples

fields.name: event_ts
fields.title: A datestamp explicitly specifying the date on which this BioSample was collected/generated

resources.name: Dataset
resources.description: A named collection of files

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this Dataset

fields.name: url
fields.title: A URL referencing this Dataset

fields.name: title
fields.title: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this Dataset

fields.name: description
fields.title: A human-readable description of this Dataset

resources.name: Organization
resources.description: A data coordination center contributing to this database

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this Organization

fields.name: url
fields.title: A URL referencing this Organization

fields.name: name
fields.title: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this Organization

fields.name: description
fields.title: A human-readable description of this Organization

resources.name: SubjectGranularity
resources.description: A descriptor for the scope of a Subject (the source for a BioSample), e.g.: single organism; group of named organisms (e.g. host plus pathogen); environmental sample

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this SubjectGranularity

fields.name: url
fields.title: A URL referencing this SubjectGranularity

fields.name: name
fields.title: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this SubjectGranularity

fields.name: description
fields.title: A human-readable description of this SubjectGranularity

resources.name: Platform
resources.description: A descriptor for the particular technologies with which an experimental procedure is performed

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this Platform

fields.name: url
fields.title: A URL referencing this Platform

fields.name: name
fields.title: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this Platform

fields.name: description
fields.title: A human-readable description of this Platform

resources.name: Method
resources.description: A specific experimental method used to generate data

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this Method

fields.name: url
fields.title: A URL referencing this Method

fields.name: name
fields.title: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this Method

fields.name: description
fields.title: A human-readable description of this Method

resources.name: SampleType
resources.description: The type of material comprising a BioSample

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this SampleType

fields.name: url
fields.title: A URL referencing this SampleType

fields.name: name
fields.title: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this SampleType

fields.name: description
fields.title: A human-readable description of this SampleType

resources.name: InformationType
resources.description: A descriptor for the type of data stored in a File

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this InformationType

fields.name: url
fields.title: A URL referencing this InformationType

fields.name: name
fields.title: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this InformationType

fields.name: description
fields.title: A human-readable description of this InformationType

resources.name: FileFormat
resources.description: A descriptor for the format in which a File has been encoded

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this FileFormat

fields.name: url
fields.title: A URL referencing this FileFormat

fields.name: name
fields.title: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this FileFormat

fields.name: description
fields.title: A human-readable description of this FileFormat

resources.name: Anatomy
resources.description: A descriptor locating the origin of a BioSample within the physiology of its Subject

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this Anatomy

fields.name: url
fields.title: A URL referencing this Anatomy

fields.name: name
fields.title: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this Anatomy

fields.name: description
fields.title: A human-readable description of this Anatomy

resources.name: Protocol
resources.description: A sequence-based description of an experimental method

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this Protocol

fields.name: url
fields.title: A URL referencing this Protocol

fields.name: name
fields.title: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this Protocol

fields.name: description
fields.title: A human-readable description of this Protocol

resources.name: SubjectGroup
resources.description: A named collection of Subjects

fields.name: id
fields.title: A globally unique ID representing this SubjectGroup

fields.name: title
fields.title: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this SubjectGroup

fields.name: description
fields.title: A human-readable description of this SubjectGroup

resources.name: FilesInDatasets
resources.description: Association between a File and a containing Dataset

fields.name: FileID
fields.title: The ID of a File

fields.name: DatasetID
fields.title: The ID of a Dataset containing the File identified in the first column

resources.name: DatasetsInDatasets
resources.description: Association between a Dataset and a containing Dataset

fields.name: ContainedDatasetID
fields.title: The ID of a contained Dataset

fields.name: ContainingDatasetID
fields.title: The ID of a Dataset containing the Dataset identified in the first column

resources.name: ProducedBy
resources.description: Association between a File and the (unique) DataEvent that produced it

fields.name: FileID
fields.title: The ID of a File

fields.name: DataEventID
fields.title: The ID of the (unique) DataEvent that produced the File identified in the first column

resources.name: AnalyzedBy
resources.description: Association between a File and a DataEvent that consumes it as an input

fields.name: FileID
fields.title: The ID of a File

fields.name: DataEventID
fields.title: The ID of a DataEvent that consumes the File identified in the first column as input

resources.name: AssayedBy
resources.description: Association between a BioSample and the (unique) DataEvent that produced it

fields.name: BioSampleID
fields.title: The ID of a BioSample

fields.name: DataEventID
fields.title: The ID of the (unique) DataEvent that produced the BioSample identified in the first column

resources.name: SubjectsInSubjectGroups
resources.description: Association between a Subject and a containing SubjectGroup

fields.name: SubjectID
fields.title: The ID of a Subject

fields.name: SubjectGroupID
fields.title: The ID of a SubjectGroup that contains the Subject identified in the first column

resources.name: ObservedBy
resources.description: Association between a Subject and a DataEvent in which data about the Subject was collected

fields.name: SubjectID
fields.title: The ID of a Subject

fields.name: DataEventID
fields.title: The ID of a DataEvent in which data about the Subject identified in the first column was collected

resources.name: SubjectTaxonomy
resources.description: Association between a Subject and a (numeric) NCBI Taxonomy Database ID describing the Subject

fields.name: SubjectID
fields.title: The ID of a Subject

fields.name: NCBITaxonID
fields.title: A CV term ID describing the taxonomy of the Subject identified in the first column (target ontology: NCBI Taxonomy Database)

resources.name: GeneratedBy
resources.description: Association between a Dataset and an Organization which contributed to the generation of that Dataset

fields.name: DatasetID
fields.title: The ID of a Dataset

fields.name: OrganizationID
fields.title: The ID of an Organization which contributed to the generation of the Dataset identified in the first column

resources.name: SponsoredBy
resources.description: Association between a Dataset and an Organization which sponsored the generation of that Dataset

fields.name: DatasetID
fields.title: The ID of a Dataset

fields.name: OrganizationID
fields.title: The ID of an Organization which sponsored the generation of the Dataset identified in the first column

resources.name: NCBI_Taxonomy_DB
resources.description: Lookup table for field values drawn from the NCBI_Taxonomy_DB CV

fields.name: id
fields.title: The canonical ID of the current taxon

fields.name: url
fields.title: A URL referencing the current taxon

fields.name: name
fields.title: Short name for the current taxon

fields.name: description
fields.title: Long descriptor for the current taxon

fields.name: synonyms
fields.title: Pipe-separated list of synonyms (alternate names) for the current taxon

resources.name: AuxiliaryData
resources.description: DCC-specific metadata not covered by the core C2M2 model

fields.name: ObjectType
fields.title: A keyword representing the type of object which the current record describes

fields.name: ObjectID
fields.title: An identifier unambiguously referencing the particular object being described

fields.name: DataDescription
fields.title: A short, human-readable description of the metadata in the current record

fields.name: Value
fields.title: The value of the metadata represented by the current record
